title: The Founder
text: Brad Smith is the founder and principal consultant at Avenge Capital Corporation. With a comprehensive background in asset expansion, leasing, tenant improvements, capital expenditures, construction management, and design, Brad brings a wealth of experience to the table. His strategic approach and attention to detail have consistently resulted in enhanced operational efficiency and increased profitability for clients across various industries.

section.title: Experienced Professional
section.content: Led major projects across leasing, development, and asset management.

section.title: Industry Leader
section.content: Skilled in capital planning, construction, and tenant improvements.
